001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.insertion;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.ComponentType;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.log.LogUi;
005import io.cyborgcode.utilities.reflections.exceptions.ReflectionException;
006import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
007import java.lang.reflect.Field;
008import java.util.Arrays;
009import java.util.Comparator;
010import java.util.List;
011import org.openqa.selenium.By;
012
013/**
014 * Abstract base class for insertion services that handle inserting data into UI components.
015 *
016 * <p>This class defines a generic mechanism to process annotated fields in an object
017 * and insert corresponding values into the UI using registered insertion services.
018 *
019 * <p>Implementing classes must define specific behaviors for extracting field annotations,
020 * determining component types, building locators, and retrieving enum values.
021 *
022 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
023 */
024public abstract class BaseInsertionService<A extends Annotation> implements InsertionService {
025
026   /**
027    * Registry that manages different insertion services.
028    */
029   protected final InsertionServiceRegistry serviceRegistry;
030
031   /**
032    * Constructs a new {@code BaseInsertionService} instance.
033    *
034    * @param serviceRegistry The registry containing available insertion services.
035    */
036   protected BaseInsertionService(final InsertionServiceRegistry serviceRegistry) {
037      this.serviceRegistry = serviceRegistry;
038   }
039
040   /**
041    * Processes the provided data object, extracts annotated fields, and inserts values
042    * into corresponding UI components.
043    *
044    * <p>The method:
045    * <ol>
046    *   <li>Retrieves all declared fields of the given object.</li>
047    *   <li>Filters and sorts the fields based on the implementation logic.</li>
048    *   <li>For each field:
049    *     <ul>
050    *       <li>Retrieves the annotation (if present).</li>
051    *       <li>Identifies the corresponding {@link ComponentType}.</li>
052    *       <li>Fetches the appropriate insertion service.</li>
053    *       <li>Builds the locator and retrieves the field value.</li>
054    *       <li>Performs pre-insertion operations (if any).</li>
055    *       <li>Invokes the insertion service to insert the value.</li>
056    *       <li>Performs post-insertion operations (if any).</li>
057    *     </ul>
058    *   </li>
059    * </ol>
060    *
061    * @param data The object containing values to be inserted into UI components.
062    * @throws IllegalStateException If no insertion service is found for a component type.
063    * @throws RuntimeException      If field access fails.
064    */
065   @SuppressWarnings("java:S3011")
066   @Override
067   public void insertData(final Object data) {
068      final Field[] fields = data.getClass().getDeclaredFields();
069      final List<Field> targetedFields = filterAndSortFields(fields);
070
071      for (Field field : targetedFields) {
072         final A annotation = field.getAnnotation(getAnnotationClass());
073
074         field.setAccessible(true);
075         try {
076            final Class<? extends ComponentType> enumClass = getComponentTypeEnumClass(annotation);
077            final Class<? extends ComponentType> componentTypeClass = extractComponentTypeClass(enumClass);
078            final Insertion service = serviceRegistry.getService(componentTypeClass);
079            if (service == null) {
080               throw new IllegalStateException(
081                     "No InsertionService registered for: " + componentTypeClass.getSimpleName()
082               );
083            }
084
085            final By locator = buildLocator(annotation);
086            final Object valueForField = field.get(data);
087
088            if (valueForField != null) {
089               beforeInsertion(annotation);
090               service.insertion(getType(annotation), locator, valueForField);
091               afterInsertion(annotation);
092            }
093         } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {
094            throw new ReflectionException("Failed to access field: " + field.getName(), e);
095         }
096      }
097      LogUi.info("Finished data insertion for [{}].", data.getClass().getSimpleName());
098   }
099
100   /**
101    * Returns the annotation type that this insertion service handles.
102    *
103    * @return the {@code Class} object of the annotation this service processes
104    */
105   protected abstract Class<A> getAnnotationClass();
106
107   /**
108    * Determines the processing order for fields annotated with this service‚Äôs annotation.
109    *
110    * <p>Fields with lower order values are processed before fields with higher values.</p>
111    *
112    * @param annotation the annotation instance found on the field
113    * @return an integer representing the priority (lower means earlier)
114    */
115   protected abstract int getOrder(A annotation);
116
117   /**
118    * Determines the enum class that implements {@link ComponentType} for the given annotation.
119    *
120    * <p>This method is used to locate the specific enum type which defines the set of
121    * component types associated with the annotation. Implementations should inspect the
122    * annotation‚Äôs attributes to return the correct enum class.</p>
123    *
124    * @param annotation the annotation instance from which to derive the component-type enum
125    * @return the {@code Class} object of an enum that implements {@link ComponentType}
126    */
127   protected abstract Class<? extends ComponentType> getComponentTypeEnumClass(A annotation);
128
129   /**
130    * Builds the locator (e.g., XPath, CSS Selector) for identifying the target component.
131    *
132    * @param annotation The annotation containing locator information.
133    * @return The Selenium {@link By} locator for the component.
134    */
135   protected abstract By buildLocator(A annotation);
136
137   /**
138    * Maps an annotation to its corresponding {@link ComponentType} enum value.
139    *
140    * <p>This tells the service which UI component type to use for insertion.</p>
141    *
142    * @param annotation the annotation instance to inspect
143    * @return the enum constant (implementing {@code ComponentType}) for this annotation
144    */
145   protected abstract ComponentType getType(A annotation);
146
147   /**
148    * Hook method to execute any pre-insertion logic.
149    *
150    * <p>Implementing classes can override this to define actions before an insertion occurs.
151    *
152    * @param annotation The annotation associated with the field being inserted.
153    */
154   protected void beforeInsertion(A annotation) {
155      // Can be overridden by subclasses if pre-insertion logic is needed
156   }
157
158   /**
159    * Hook method to execute any post-insertion logic.
160    *
161    * <p>Implementing classes can override this to define actions after an insertion occurs.
162    *
163    * @param annotation The annotation associated with the field that was inserted.
164    */
165   protected void afterInsertion(A annotation) {
166      // default no-op
167   }
168
169   /**
170    * Filters and sorts the fields of an object before processing insertions.
171    *
172    * <p>Implementations can define sorting logic to prioritize certain fields over others.
173    *
174    * @param fields The list of declared fields in the object.
175    * @return A filtered and sorted list of fields to be processed.
176    */
177   protected final List<Field> filterAndSortFields(final Field[] fields) {
178      return Arrays.stream(fields)
179            .filter(field -> field.isAnnotationPresent(getAnnotationClass()))
180            .sorted(Comparator.comparingInt(field ->
181                  getOrder(field.getAnnotation(getAnnotationClass()))))
182            .toList();
183   }
184
185   /**
186    * Resolves the specific interface that implements {@link ComponentType} from a given enum class.
187    *
188    * <p>If the provided {@code componentTypeClass} directly implements {@code ComponentType},
189    * it is returned immediately. Otherwise, this method inspects its interfaces and returns
190    * the first one that in turn extends {@code ComponentType}.</p>
191    *
192    * @param componentTypeClass the enum class (or interface) to inspect for a ComponentType implementation
193    * @return the interface class which extends {@code ComponentType}
194    * @throws IllegalStateException if no interface extending {@code ComponentType} is found
195    */
196   protected static Class<? extends ComponentType> extractComponentTypeClass(
197         final Class<? extends ComponentType> componentTypeClass) {
198      if (Arrays.asList(componentTypeClass.getInterfaces()).contains(ComponentType.class)) {
199         return componentTypeClass;
200      }
201
202      @SuppressWarnings("unchecked") final Class<? extends ComponentType> resolved =
203            (Class<? extends ComponentType>) Arrays.stream(componentTypeClass.getInterfaces())
204                  .filter(inter -> Arrays.asList(inter.getInterfaces())
205                        .contains(ComponentType.class))
206                  .findFirst()
207                  .orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalStateException(
208                        "No interface extending ComponentType found in " + componentTypeClass
209                  ));
210      return resolved;
211   }
212
213}
